data.title: Paranormal Activity 4 Reviews + Where to Watch Movie Online, Stream or Skip?
data.meta_description: Where to Watch Paranormal Activity 4  Full Movie Streaming online on iTunes, YouTube, MxPlayer. Find the best sources playing your favorite movies.
data.text: Paranormal Activity 4 is a 2012 English-language Horror Comedy movie written by Christopher Landon, Chad Feehan and Oren Peli. The movie is directed by Henry Joost and Ariel Schulman and produced by Jason Blum and Oren Peli under the banner of Blumhouse Productions. It has been five years since the disappearance of Katie and Hunter, and a suburban family witness strange events in their neighborhood when a woman and a mysterious child move in. Paranormal activity 4 stars Kathryn Newton in the lead role along with an ensemble cast including Matt Shively, Aiden Lovekamp, Brady Allen, Stephen Dunham, Alexondra Lee and Katie Featherston. The screenplay is written by Christopher Landon. The music was composed by Sean Callery. Cinematography was done by Doug Emmett and editing by Gregory Plotkin. The film has a running time of 88 minutes. It was released on 25th October 2012. The Film was successful at box office. Paranormal Activity 4 was made on a budget of $3 million and it was a super hit at box office gross of $177 million. Distribution rights for the film were acquired by Paramount Pictures. It has been five years since the disappearance of Katie and Hunter, and a suburban family witness strange events in their neighborhood when a woman and a mysterious child move in.
